pitch: Hi Mayor! It's Jordan. Congratulations on the election! Before building, you'll need funds. Claim your grant below. You can then close this dialog if you want to play and explore first, or invest right away!
welcome_back: Welcome back Mayor! Would you like to buy real estate fractions? Don't forget: these shares also act as powerful boosters for your city's progression!
faq_1_a: A 'Real World Asset'. It's a physical asset (building, business) whose shares are on the blockchain.
faq_2_a: It's dividing a real contract into thousands of digital tickets accessible to everyone.
faq_3_a: It's the annual yield that your investment generates in your Vault.
